title: Acupuntura tradicional japonesa | Dr. Harada | En Kamalaya
description: El Dr. Harada obtuvo su licencia de acupuntura nacional japonesa en 1988 y ofrece tratamientos eficaces para diversos problemas de salud.
cleaned_text: DR HARADA SHUUZABUROU - MÉDICO VISITANTE EN KAMALAYA 21 September - 05 October 2023 ACUPUNTURA TRADICIONAL JAPONESA Y QI GONG SOBRE HARADA Dr Harada qualified for the Japanese National Acupuncture license in 1988 and has spent more than 30 years treating patients with a variety of health concerns using techniques from Japanese acupuncture and Qi Gong. His often include moxibustion - the burning of dried the skin - to warm and stimulate certain acupuncture points, thus invigorating the flow of vital Qi (energy) in the body. Dr Harada also practices Setai Body Work, a traditional to reduce joint pain and increase the range of motion of an injured limb. RECOMENDADO PARA CONOZCA AL DR. HARADA TRATAMIENTO EXPLICADO Acupuncture is an ancient practice based on the belief that Qi flows in an intricate network of channels or meridians throughout the body, rising closest to the surface at the acupuncture points. Japanese acupuncture uses a very needling preventative medicine. Treatment benefits include: - Curación abdominal y digestiva (incluyendo gases y cicatrices quirúrgicas) - Tratamiento de las articulaciones (cuello, hombros, espalda, rodillas) - Curación ginecológica - Depresión, ansiedad y letargo - Dolor crónico, mareos, dolores de cabeza - Infección sinusal crónica - Acupuntura auricular para perder peso - Acupuntura estética (tratamientos de belleza facial) Dr Harada is also available for private Qi Gong lessons if you wish to learn more about incorporating this form of healing exercise into your daily routine. RESERVE UNA SESIÓN CON EL DR. HARADA EXPLORA ELIGE TUS OPCIONES
